welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Irthlingborough! This quaint town is known for its charming streets, friendly locals, and beautiful scenery. We invite you to explore and experience all that our lovely city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Northampton Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Northampton Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Royal Air Force Alconbury Airport serves as the primary hub for commercial and military flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the terminal, but may require a login or fee for access.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cottesmore RAF Airport handles all commercial flights and offers a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Cottesmore RAF Airport is used for military operations and is not open to the public.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the main terminal.
